title: Video: New Looks at Disney’s Pandora – The World of Avatar Attraction
text:
SHARE New videos tease Disney’s Animal Kingdom’s Pandora – The World of Avatar attraction 
We’re about to be seeing a whole lot more from Disney’s Animal Kingdom ‘s Avatar attraction. Disney Parks announced that on Thursday, March 9, ABC will offer looks inside the much anticipated Pandora – The World of Avatar . Until then, we’ve got two new videos about Pandora that you can check out in the players below. The Avatar attraction will open to the public on May 27. 
RELATED: A New Look at Pandora – The World of Avatar 
Pandora – The World of Avatar will transport guests to a visually-stunning world complete with floating mountains and bioluminescent plants. Here, guests will be able to experience two excursions that will truly push adventure to the next level. First, the family-friendly Na’vi River Journey will send guests down a sacred river hidden within a bioluminescent rainforest. Their journey will end in an unforgettable encounter with a Na’vi Shaman, a figure who has a deep connection to the life force of Pandora. And second, the Avatar Flight of Passage excursion will offer the jaw-dropping experience of riding on a Banshee over the world of Pandora. 
Tomorrow’s Good Morning America will tour the Avatar attraction and offer a first look at Flight of Passage . Then, The View ‘s Whoopi Goldberg will join director James Cameron for a look at the Na’vi River Journey . The daytime previews then conclude as The Chew examines Lumpia , a unique and delicious snack found only on Pandora. Tomorrow evening, though, Nightline will offer it’s own inside look. 
As far as Avatar 2 goes, we’re still awaiting an official release date. As of the last update, the first Avatar sequel is planned for a December 2018 release with the second to follow in December 2020, and the third and fourth in 2022 and 2023. Avatar 2, 3, 4 and 5 will be produced by James Cameron and Jon Landau through their Lightstorm Entertainment. 
What do you think of the new Pandora: The World of Avatar attraction videos? Are you going to tune in to ABC tomorrow? Let us know your thoughts in the comments below!
